skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 1 turn. The chance increases by 0.75% for every 1% of HP this Champion loses.
Attacks 1 enemy. Puts the target’s skills on cooldown. If the enemy team has any duplicates of the target Champion, will also put all their skills on cooldown.

Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of removing 2 random buffs. Has a 75% chance of decreasing all enemies’ Turn Meters by 20%. Decreases enemy Tum Meters by a further 0.2% for every 1% of HP this Champion loses.

Prevents this Champion’s death and keeps them alive on 1 HP when hit by a fatal hit. If this skill prevents this Champion’s death, heals them by 10% of their MAX HP, fills their Turn Meter by 20%, and places a [Shield] buff on them equal to 30% of their MAX HP for 2 turns. Will not prevent this Champion’s death if they are under a [Heal Reduction] debuff.
